mean_cn: n. 最简式抽象派艺术家，最低纲领主义者；  adj. 最简式抽象派艺术家的
mean_en: of, relating to, or following a style in art, literature, or music that is very simple and uses a small number of colors, parts, materials, etc.
sentence: His minimalist pure-white paintings took him no time to paint.
sentence_trans: 他的“最低限度纯白绘画”基本上不需要花时间。
